text: Bierné-les-Villages is a commune in the Mayenne department in northwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Bierné (the seat), Argenton-Notre-Dame, Saint-Laurent-des-Mortiers and Saint-Michel-de-Feins.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Mayenne department ==References== Category:Communes of Mayenne
title: Bierné-les-Villages
